alert.note: Alert for Ravalli (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 04 at 8:34AM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR THE BITTERROOT RIVER AT BELL CROSSING IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Ravalli County along the Bitterroot River, especially near Bell Crossing and Victor. * WHEN...Until 830 PM MDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 831 AM MDT, Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
